channel.title: Combat level not showing 0
channel.description:
okay well i trying to make it show my combat
heres wat i added...
[code]p.sendQuest("@gre@Combat:"+p.combatLevel, 2427);[/code]
in game it shows Combat:0 i want it to actualy show my combat lol, im a lvl 126 :/
[size=20pt]USING PROJECT CZAR[/size][br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 08, 2009, 03:21:36 pm[/size][hr]bump?
